scripts.start: npm run server | npm run sass
scripts.server: npm run view && budo src/main.js:bundle.js -p 8080 --live --open -- -d -e src/main.js -t [babelify --comments false --presets es2015]
scripts.init: npm run view && npm run import:all && node-sass -o css/ scss/
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run copy:all && npm run build:env
scripts.build:js: browserify -d -e src/main.js -t [babelify --comments false --presets es2015] | uglifyjs -cm > build/bundle.min.js
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:phaser && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:css
scripts.publish: npm run tinypng && npm run build && node build-scripts/publish.js
scripts.import:all: npm run import:spritesheets && npm run import:atlas
